if exists virtual_event Hibernate: create table advertisement (budget float(53) not null, clicks integer not null, impressions integer not null, ad_id bigint not null auto_increment, creator_id bigint not null, end_date datetime(6) not null, start_date datetime(6) not null, store_id bigint not null, timestamp datetime(6) not null, status varchar(50) not null, title varchar(100) not null, content varchar(500) not null, video_url varchar(255), primary key (ad_id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table advertisement_images (advertisement_ad_id bigint not null, images varchar(255)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table app_feedback (created_at datetime(6), id bigint not null auto_increment, contact_email varchar(100), comment varchar(1000) not null, app_feedback_type enum ('BUG_REPORT','FEATURE_REQUEST','GENERAL','PERFORMANCE','USER_EXPERIENCE'), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table blog_post (reaction_number integer not null, status bit not null, created_at datetime(6), id bigint not null auto_increment, updated_at datetime(6), user_id bigint, content varchar(255), image varchar(255), tag varchar(255), title varchar(255), reaction enum ('ANGRY','HAHA','LIKE','LOVE','SAD','WOW'), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table comment (blog_post_id bigint, created_at datetime(6), id bigint not null auto_increment, modified_at datetime(6), parent_comment_id bigint, user_id bigint not null, content varchar(255), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table creator (commission_rate float(53) not null, creator_id bigint not null auto_increment, timestamp datetime(6) not null, user_id bigint not null, tier_classification varchar(50) not null, bio varchar(500) not null, behance_link varchar(255), facebook_link varchar(255), github_link varchar(255), instagram_link varchar(255), linkedin_link varchar(255), portfolio varchar(255) not null, snapchat_link varchar(255), specialties varchar(255) not null, whatsapp_link varchar(255), youtube_link varchar(255), primary key (creator_id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table custom_order (price float(53) not null, quantity integer not null, id bigint not null auto_increment, order_date datetime(6), payment_id bigint, user_id bigint, status enum ('CANCELED','CONFIRMED','PENDING'), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table donation (amount float(53) not null, anonymity_setting bit not null, campaign_id bigint, donation_id bigint not null auto_increment, store_id bigint not null, timestamp datetime(6) not null, user_id bigint not null, type varchar(50) not null, donor_message varchar(500), primary key (donation_id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table donation_campaign (current_amount float(53) not null, goal float(53) not null, campaign_id bigint not null auto_increment, end_date datetime(6) not null, start_date datetime(6) not null, store_id bigint not null, timestamp datetime(6) not null, user_id bigint not null, status varchar(50) not null, title varchar(100) not null, description varchar(500) not null, cause varchar(255) not null, primary key (campaign_id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table donor_reward (donation_id bigint not null, expiration_date datetime(6) not null, issuance_date datetime(6) not null, redemption_date datetime(6), reward_id bigint not null auto_increment, timestamp datetime(6) not null, redemption_code varchar(50), redemption_status varchar(50) not null, type varchar(50) not null, details varchar(500) not null, primary key (reward_id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table event_participant (attended bit not null, id bigint not null auto_increment, timestamp datetime(6) not null, user_id bigint not null, virtual_event_id bigint not null, primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table event_ticket (early_bird_pricing float(53), price float(53) not null, quantity_available integer not null, quantity_remaining integer not null, ticket_id bigint not null auto_increment, timestamp datetime(6) not null, virtual_event_id bigint not null, type varchar(50) not null, name varchar(100) not null, description varchar(500) not null, primary key (ticket_id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table formation (certificate_available bit not null, duration integer not null, price float(53) not null, id bigint not null auto_increment, user_id bigint, course_title varchar(255), description varchar(255), language varchar(255), formation_category enum ('COOKING','HANDMADE','POTTERY','SEWING'), level enum ('ADVANCED','BEGINNER','INTERMEDIATE'), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table notification (date_published datetime(6), id bigint not null auto_increment, content varchar(255), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table notification_users (notifications_id bigint not null, users_id bigint not null) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table offer (discount float(53) not null, end_date datetime(6) not null, id bigint not null auto_increment, start_date datetime(6) not null, user_id bigint not null, name varchar(150) not null, description varchar(500) not null, offer enum ('BUYERSERVICE','INVESTORSERVICE','SELLERSERVICE') not null, primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table order_product (order_id bigint not null, product_id bigint not null) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table payment (amount float(53) not null, id bigint not null auto_increment, transaction_date datetime(6), status enum ('CASHONDELIVER','CREDITCARD','PAYPAL'), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table product (has_discount bit not null, price float(53) not null, stock_quantity integer not null, created_at datetime(6), product_id bigint not null auto_increment, store_id bigint, updated_at datetime(6), product_name varchar(100) not null, description varchar(500), category enum ('ART_PAINTINGS','BOOKS_STATIONERY','CLOTHING_ACCESSORIES','CRAFTS_DIY','DIGITAL_PRODUCTS','ECO_FRIENDLY','HANDMADE_JEWELRY','HEALTH_WELLNESS','HOME_DECOR','LOCAL_FOODS','PET_SUPPLIES','POTTERY_CERAMICS','TEXTILES_FABRICS','TOYS_GAMES','VINTAGE_ANTIQUES'), primary key (product_id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table product_images (product_product_id bigint not null, images varchar(255)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table proposal_perso (price float(23) not null, delivery_time datetime(6), id bigint not null auto_increment, request_perso_id bigint, description varchar(255), image varchar(255), title varchar(255), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table question (id bigint not null auto_increment, quiz_id bigint, question varchar(255), question_type enum ('FREETEXT','MULTIPLECHOICE','SINGLECHOICE'), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table quiz (score integer not null, id bigint not null auto_increment, user_id bigint, description varchar(255), title varchar(255), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table request_perso (max_price float(23) not null, min_price float(23) not null, delivery_time datetime(6), id bigint not null auto_increment, user_id bigint, description varchar(255), image varchar(255), title varchar(255), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table response (id bigint not null auto_increment, question_id bigint, response varchar(255), primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table store (status bit not null, created_at datetime(6), store_id bigint not null auto_increment, updated_at datetime(6), user_id bigint, store_name varchar(100) not null, description varchar(500), address varchar(255) not null, image varchar(255), category enum ('ART_PAINTINGS','BOOKS_STATIONERY','CLOTHING_ACCESSORIES','CRAFTS_DIY','DIGITAL_PRODUCTS','ECO_FRIENDLY','HANDMADE_JEWELRY','HEALTH_WELLNESS','HOME_DECOR','LOCAL_FOODS','PET_SUPPLIES','POTTERY_CERAMICS','TEXTILES_FABRICS','TOYS_GAMES','VINTAGE_ANTIQUES'), primary key (store_id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table store_feedback (rating integer not null check ((rating>=1) and (rating<=5)), would_recommend bit not null, created_at datetime(6), store_feedback_id bigint not null auto_increment, store_id bigint, user_id bigint, comment varchar(1000) not null, store_feedback_type enum ('CUSTOMER_SERVICE','DELIVERY','PACKAGING','PRICING','PRODUCT_QUALITY'), primary key (store_feedback_id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table user (enabled bit not null, is_active bit not null, points integer not null check (points>=0), status bit not null, id bigint not null auto_increment, registration_date datetime(6), firstname varchar(100) not null, lastname varchar(100) not null, name varchar(100) not null, email varchar(150) not null, address varchar(255), image varchar(255), password varchar(255) not null, phone varchar(255), verification_token varchar(255), role enum ('ADMIN','INVESTOR','SELLER','USER') not null, primary key (id)) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: create table virtual_event (ticket_price float(53) not null, event_date datetime(6) not null, event_id bigint
